name: CCC (NIELIT): Online Mock Tests
description: Preparing for CCC (NIELIT) Exam? Download the No. 1 Vernacular Test Series app #EduGorilla and get:  - 17,201+ mocks for 550+ competitive exams - Questions that you would probably get in CCC Exam - A multitude of CCC mocks, sectional tests, and previous year papers - Tests in both English and Hindi  About Course on Computer Concepts (CCC):  Course on Computer Concepts (CCC) is a certification exam conducted by NIELIT (National Institute of Electronics and Information Technology) every month. The CCC is the most basic certification course and is a preferred qualification for various Government jobs. You can practice mock tests of Course on Computer Concepts (CCC) online and achieve success.
